summary: Professional website for Jonathan Ayan, a life and annuity insurance broker working for Equity Insurance Partners. Licensed to serve clients in all 50 states. Homepage showcasing broker information, services offered, and A+ rated insurance companies represented (Mutual of Omaha, FNG, Transamerica, Ethos, Forrester, and others). Contact: jonathanayan.eip@gmail.com, 239-331-0544.
architectural_notes: Professional presentation for insurance broker services
Display broker credentials and company affiliations
Fidelity and Guaranteed Life (not FNG abbreviation)
Display carrier logos professionally instead of placeholder boxes
Carriers section should show featured logos plus indicator of 25+ additional carriers
Contact form must include age field and comments/additional information text area for health/medication details
known_issues: Admin panel authentication shows 'access denied' when users attempt to log in with Internet Identity

existing_features.title: Create a professional homepage that introduces Jonathan Ayan as a life and annuity insurance broker based in Miami, Florida
Display a section showcasing the A-rated insurance companies Jonathan represents, including Mutual of Omaha, FNG, Transamerica, Ethos, and Forrester
Create a services section explaining life insurance and annuities offerings with clear descriptions of what assistance is available
Include contact information section for potential clients to reach Jonathan Ayan

Design the homepage with a professional, trustworthy visual theme using warm, sophisticated colors (such as navy blue, gold accents, and crisp whites), clean typography, and a layout that conveys stability and expertise appropriate for financial services
Update the companies section text from 'A-rated' or 'A minus rated' to 'A+ rated' to accurately reflect the insurance carriers' ratings
Remove the period between first and last name in the email address, changing from 'jonathan.ayan.eip@gmail.com' to 'jonathanayan.eip@gmail.com' in all locations where the email is displayed
Remove business hours limitation (9-6) from the contact section and update text to indicate Jonathan Ayan is available anytime with no specific hours
Replace the blue box display in the companies section with professional company logos for Mutual of Omaha, Transamerica, Ethos, and Fidelity and Guaranteed Life
Correct the carrier name from 'FNG' to 'Fidelity and Guaranteed Life' throughout the companies section

Create a contact form in the ContactSection component with fields for first name, last name, state (dropdown), product interest (dropdown with options for Life Insurance and Annuities), and coverage amount (text input)
Replace the current Ethos logo with an updated Ethos insurance company logo in the CompaniesSection component
Add Forrester insurance company logo to the CompaniesSection component alongside the existing carrier logos (Mutual of Omaha, Transamerica, Ethos, Fidelity and Guaranteed Life)
Add a visual indicator in the CompaniesSection showing '+ 25 other carriers' to represent additional insurance companies beyond the primary logos displayed
Add an age input field to the contact form in the ContactSection component, positioned after the coverage amount field and before the submit button

Add a comments textarea field to the contact form in the ContactSection component for users to provide additional information about their health or medications, positioned after the age field and before the submit button

Fix the text visibility issue in the HeroSection component where the 'Contact Me' call-to-action text is not readable against the background, by changing the background color or adjusting contrast to ensure clear legibility

Add a gender selection field to the contact form in the ContactSection component, positioned at the bottom of the form after the comments textarea field and before the submit button, with options for 'Male' and 'Female'

Enhance the overall website visual design to appear more professional by introducing additional colors beyond the current navy blue and gold palette, adding visual variety through color accents, improved typography contrast, section backgrounds with subtle gradients or patterns, and enhanced spacing
Integrate the professional business photo of Jonathan Ayan (IMG_4311.jpeg) into the website in the most effective location, optimizing for trust-building and professional presentation

Add decorative images and visual elements throughout the website to enhance professional appearance, including background patterns, section dividers, icons, or illustrative elements that complement the insurance and financial services theme
Trigger a full redeployment of the website to the Internet Computer network to resolve the 'Canister ID Not Resolved' error

Adjust the CSS styling in the CompaniesSection component to ensure all insurance company logos (Mutual of Omaha, Transamerica, Ethos, Fidelity and Guaranteed Life, and Forrester) are displayed in their entirety without any cropping or cutoff, maintaining proper aspect ratios and ensuring all logo elements are fully visible

Modify the CompaniesSection component styling to eliminate logo cropping by adjusting container heights, padding, and object-fit properties to ensure all insurance company logos (Mutual of Omaha, Transamerica, Ethos, Fidelity and Guaranteed Life, and Forrester) display completely with proper aspect ratios and no visual cutoff

Replace all five insurance company logos in the CompaniesSection component with alternative logo versions that display properly without cropping, sourcing different logo files for Mutual of Omaha, Transamerica, Ethos, Fidelity and Guaranteed Life, and Forrester that have better aspect ratios or simpler designs

Create a new section component positioned at the top of the website (after HeroSection, before ServicesSection) that explains the benefits of opening a life insurance policy for children either at birth or at any age, emphasizing that it builds tax-free wealth that can be used later in life at any point and explaining how it grows with compounded interest and market protection
In frontend/src/App.tsx, reorder the component rendering so that ChildBenefitsSection appears after ServicesSection instead of before it, maintaining all decorative dividers between sections

In the CompaniesSection component (frontend/src/components/CompaniesSection.tsx), modify the logo display implementation to ensure all five insurance company logos (Mutual of Omaha, Transamerica, Ethos, Fidelity and Guaranteed Life, and Forrester) are shown in their entirety without any cropping or cutoff, by adjusting container dimensions, object-fit properties, padding, and aspect ratio constraints so that each logo's full visual content is visible

In the CompaniesSection component (frontend/src/components/CompaniesSection.tsx), fix the logo display so that all five insurance company logos (Mutual of Omaha, Transamerica, Ethos, Fidelity and Guaranteed Life, and Forrester) are visible on the page, not just Transamerica

In the CompaniesSection component (frontend/src/components/CompaniesSection.tsx), ensure all insurance company logos display in full color rather than grayscale or monochrome, removing any CSS filters or opacity effects that may be desaturating the logos

In the CompaniesSection component (frontend/src/components/CompaniesSection.tsx), fix the Mutual of Omaha logo display to show the complete logo without any cropping or cutoff by adjusting the container dimensions, object-fit properties, padding, and aspect ratio constraints

In the CompaniesSection component (frontend/src/components/CompaniesSection.tsx), fix the Ethos logo display to show the complete logo without any cropping or cutoff by adjusting the container dimensions, object-fit properties, padding, and aspect ratio constraints

In the CompaniesSection component (frontend/src/components/CompaniesSection.tsx), fix the Fidelity and Guaranteed Life logo display to show the complete logo without any cropping or cutoff by adjusting the container dimensions, object-fit properties, padding, and aspect ratio constraints

In the CompaniesSection component (frontend/src/components/CompaniesSection.tsx), make the Foresters logo visible and display properly by ensuring the logo image source is correctly referenced and the container styling allows it to render without being hidden
In the CompaniesSection component (frontend/src/components/CompaniesSection.tsx), replace the Mutual of Omaha logo with a different logo version that displays properly without cropping
In the CompaniesSection component (frontend/src/components/CompaniesSection.tsx), replace the Transamerica logo with a different logo version that displays properly without cropping
In the CompaniesSection component (frontend/src/components/CompaniesSection.tsx), replace the Ethos logo with a different logo version that displays properly without cropping
In the CompaniesSection component (frontend/src/components/CompaniesSection.tsx), replace the Fidelity and Guaranteed Life logo with a different logo version that displays properly without cropping
Update the ContactSection component to call the backend save method when the form is submitted, replacing the current local storage implementation
Create an admin panel page component where Jonathan can view all contact form submissions in a table format with all submission details
Implement Internet Identity authentication protection for the admin panel so only authenticated users can view the submissions
Add navigation to access the admin panel from the main website, positioned discreetly (e.g., footer link or hidden route)
Update the useQueries.ts hook to include a query method for fetching all contact form submissions from the backend
Verify that the AdminPanel.tsx component correctly handles the authentication flow and admin role check without triggering access denied errors

Add best time and day fields to the contact form in the ContactSection component, positioned at the bottom of the form after the gender field and before the submit button. Include a time dropdown (Morning, Afternoon, Evening) and a day dropdown (Monday through Sunday, or Any Day).
Update the useSubmitContactForm mutation hook in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts to include bestTimeToContact and bestDayToContact fields when submitting the contact form.
Update the admin panel submissions table in frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx to display the bestTimeToContact and bestDayToContact columns for each submission.

In the ContactSection component (frontend/src/components/ContactSection.tsx), replace the bestTimeToContact dropdown field with an hour selector that allows clients to choose a specific hour throughout the day (e.g., 1:00 AM through 12:00 PM and 1:00 PM through 11:00 PM, or 00:00 through 23:00 in 24-hour format)

In the ContactSection component (frontend/src/components/ContactSection.tsx), replace the bestDayToContact dropdown field with a day-of-month input that allows clients to enter or select a specific day of the month (1-31)
Update the admin panel submissions table in frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx to display the new bestTimeToContact (specific hour) and bestDayToContact (day of month) values in a readable format

In the ContactSection component (frontend/src/components/ContactSection.tsx), replace the bestTimeToContact dropdown field with an hour selector that allows clients to choose a specific hour throughout the day in 12-hour format (1:00 AM, 2:00 AM, ..., 11:00 AM, 12:00 PM, 1:00 PM, ..., 11:00 PM, 12:00 AM) or 24-hour format (00:00 through 23:00)

Update the useSubmitContactForm mutation hook in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts to submit the new bestTimeToContact value (specific hour format) and bestDayToContact value (day of month number) to the backend

Update the admin panel submissions table in frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx to display the bestTimeToContact column showing the specific hour format and the bestDayToContact column showing the day of month number in a readable format

new_feature_requests.summary: Create homepage with broker information and services
Display A-rated insurance companies represented
Show contact information and Miami, Florida location
Add contact form with fields for first name, last name, state, product interest, and coverage amount
Update licensing information to show licensed in all 50 states (not just Miami)
Add Equity Insurance Partners as the brokerage name
Display contact information: email jonathanayan.eip@gmail.com and phone 239-331-0544
Remove business hours (9-6) and indicate availability anytime
Replace carrier blue boxes with professional company logos for Mutual of Omaha, Transamerica, Ethos, and Fidelity and Guaranteed Life
Correct FNG to full name: Fidelity and Guaranteed Life
Add contact form with fields for all client information (first name, last name, state, product interest, coverage amount)
Change/update the Ethos logo in the carriers section
Add Forrester insurance company logo to the carriers section
Add a '+ 25 other carriers' indicator/section to show additional insurance companies represented
Add age field to contact form
Add comments/additional information text area to contact form for health or medication details
Fix contact section header text visibility by changing background color/contrast
Add gender field (male/female) to contact form at the bottom
Enhance website visual design with more colors and professional appearance
Add business photo of Jonathan Ayan to the website in optimal location
Fix insurance company logos display to show full logos without cutoff
Add section at top of website explaining benefits of opening life insurance for children (tax-free wealth building, compounded interest with market protection)
Replace Mutual of Omaha logo with a different/better logo version
Replace Transamerica logo with a different/better logo version
Replace Ethos logo with a different/better logo version
Replace F&G (Fidelity and Guaranteed) logo with a different/better logo version
Build backend database to store contact form submissions with admin panel for viewing leads

Create a Motoko backend data model to store contact form submissions with fields for first name, last name, state, product interest (Life Insurance or Annuities), coverage amount, age, gender, and additional comments
Implement backend methods to save contact form submissions to stable storage and retrieve all submissions
Update the backend main.mo actor to remove or modify the admin access control check that is causing 'access denied' errors when users attempt to log in to the admin panel at /admin route
Update the useActor hook in frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts to ensure the actor is properly initialized with the authenticated identity before admin panel queries execute
Add best time/day to contact field at bottom of contact form
Update the backend ContactFormSubmission data model in backend/main.mo to include bestTimeToContact and bestDayToContact fields to store the new form data.

Fix the admin panel access control in backend/main.mo to explicitly grant admin access to the principal associated with Jonathan Ayan's Internet Identity, allowing him to authenticate and view the admin panel without 'access denied' errors.
Change best time to contact from dropdown (Morning/Afternoon/Evening) to specific hour selection (time picker or hourly dropdown)
Change best day to contact from day-of-week dropdown to specific day of month input (date picker or text field for day number 1-31)

Update the backend ContactFormSubmission type in backend/main.mo to accommodate the new bestTimeToContact format (specific hour) and bestDayToContact format (day of month as a number) if the current Text type is insufficient
